English: The nausea has inspired a breakthrough in our understanding of gravity
It's a little bug with thousands of legs, that was found crawling over an instrument panel!
Inspired by the Mun, it's a new twist on a classic Cheesecake
The result of hours of deep though has created a breakthrough in our understanding of the universe
A strange set of responses from the ship's computer warrant further investigation
Driven by isolation, we have expanded our understanding around the so called 'social sciences'
A small piece of space rock that miraculously sealed the very hole it created whilst impacting at several kilometers per second
A particularily grainy picture of what appears to be a weather balloon
A background signal on our CommNet has revealed the possiblity of extraterrestial life, along with a little picture of a strange alien!
Instructions for a new beach game created by the crew, after being inspired by a mysterious giant green ball
An observational analysis of the dust storms on this strage red planet
Designs for a special handkerchief that stops even the tiniest momentum caused by sneezing knocking us into an escape trajectory
The extreme heat has taught us new ways to cook an egg on the hull of the ship! Mmmmm tasty!
A hastily written description of strange visions seen whilst dreaming, alone on a distant planet
Deciding to throw a little party, the crew tried to improve on the Mun Cheesecake reciepe, and this is the new improved recipe
A detailed account of strange flicking lights and mild luminence in this alien atmosphere
A small sample of shiny dust that seems to flicker and occasionally glow
A treatise on the enduring companionship of crew in deep space, very enlightening!
